-e ---

√stand
𓆖 steady
𓆓 𓏏 𓇾 𓇳 𓏭 | daily, every day | quotidien <> total dura 𓆓 𓏏 𓇾 | eternity, for ever| static stasis
𓆓 𓂧 𓊽 | stable, enduring|stetig
𓆓 𓏏 𓏤 𓆓 𓏏 𓇾 | for ever|STEADY 2
𓈖 𓆓 𓏏 𓏤 𓆓 𓏏 𓇿 in eternity, for ever
𓈖 𓆓 𓏏 𓏤 𓆓 𓏏 𓇿 ana durati 𒀀𒈾 𒁕𒀀𒊑 a-na da-a-ri

𓋴 𓆓 𓆑 𓅰 | foundation, endowment|⇔stätte/start/stativ/steady:
𓋴 𓊽 𓊽 to steady, make permanent

𓆓 𓏏 𓇾 ⇔ durati ⇔ ṣir-ti 𒈲𒋾 ?

𒆤𒌅 kit-tu 𓆓 𓏏 𓇾
𒆤𒌅 kit-tu ⇔ getreu certain steady
𒆤𒌅 steadiness, truth, reliability
𒆤𒌅 •mat-tu maat math ⇔ ἀμυγδάλη amygdale

etc

  1. 𒀸 𒅗 𒂵 𒆠 𒈲𒋾 𒃻 𒉡 𒉽 𒊒
  2. ina DU.GA ki ṣir-ti šá NU KÚR-ru
  3. in duce 𓎡 certai ca ne cross/chron

  4. At your exalted command that cannot be changed,

  5. 𒅇 𒀭𒉌 𒆠 𒆠 𒉏 𒃻 𒉡 𒁄 𒌑
  6. ù an-ni ki ki-nim šá NU BAL-ú
  7. und anno 𓎡 co-nehm ça ne falter/'endûr
  8. And your righteous consent that cannot be altered,

(frequent stock phrase, used in pleas and at the end of prayers)
